page.title: 04Earl of Airlie,Cortachy.
page.content: {David George Coke Patrick Ogilvy}the {13th Earl}born{1926}succeeded to the title in{1968.}He served in the Scots {Guards}being A.D.C.to the C.in C.in Germany in{1945}and later to the High Commissioner in Austria.In{1951}he took up a career in{Merchant Banking } rising to become chairman of {Schroders.}He acted as director of several large companies.Lord Airlie was also{Treasurer to the Scout {Assocn}.He retired in{1984}to become {Lord Chamberlain}and as such has the use of a house in{St.James's {Palace.}The family home is{Cortachy {Castle.}In his younger days he was a keen horseman.He is a skilful shot and keen naturalist. {Lady Airlie,}American by birth,was the first American to be appointed {Lady-in-Waiting}to the{Queen.}
